attributes.title: Call of Duty: MW3 - Spec Ops With Geoff & Gavin - Part 1
attributes.description: Gavin and Geoff play the "Hostage Taker" Spec Ops mission in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3.

attributes.title: MLB2k12 with Geoff and Gav
attributes.description: Geoff teaches Gavin the rules of baseball in MLB 2K12. Things seemed to be going smoothly until Geoff shit his pants while recording this commentary.

attributes.title: TrialsHD with Jack, Joel & Burnie
attributes.description: Jack recently tried playing the Diabolic level in TrialsHD, one of the hardest in the game.  This is his experience along the way as Burnie and Joel "help" him out in the background.  Enjoy!

attributes.title: Mass Effect 3 With Geoff, Gav, & Michael
attributes.description: Geoff, Gav, & Michael play the Mass Effect 3 cooperative multiplayer mode for the first time and fail miserably at it over and over again.

attributes.title: Mari0 With Geoff, Gavin, Michael, & Ryan
attributes.description:
Join Geoff, Gavin, Michael, & Ryan as they play Mari0 for the first time. Alliances will be made, friendships will be broken, but in the end, only one thing is certain. Gavin sucks.

Mari0 combines the original side scrolling 8-bit adventure with the futuristic portal technology developed by Aperture science. Mario with portals.

Mari0: http://stabyourself.net/mari0/

attributes.title: Contra With Michael & Gavin
attributes.description:
Michael and Gavin go old school as they Let's Play Contra for the Xbox Live Arcade. 

Will they need the 30 extra lives to complete it or are they skilled enough to go it without....of course they need the Contra code.

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed Revelations With Geoff, Gavin, Michael, & Jack
attributes.description: The Achievement Hunter crew takes a stab at the highly addictive "Wanted" multiplayer gametype in Assassin's Creed Revelations.

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed Revelations With Geoff, Gavin, Michael, & Jack Part II
attributes.description: The Achievement Hunter crew takes a stab at the highly addictive "Wanted" multiplayer gametype in Assassin's Creed Revelations.

attributes.title: Trials Evolution
attributes.description:
The gang from Achievement Hunter tries the insanely fun and extremely addictive multiplayer in Trials Evolution for the Xbox Live Arcade. 

Slap on some kneepads, don your Mjolnir helmet, and prepare yourself for the ride of your life.

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed Revelations Part III
attributes.description: The Achievement Hunter crew takes a stab at the highly addictive "Wanted" multiplayer gametype in Assassin's Creed Revelations.

attributes.title: Awesomenauts
attributes.description:
Join the entire Achievement Hunter office as Geoff, Jack, Gavin, Ryan, Ray, and Michael go head to head in a 3vs3 match in Awesomenauts for the Xbox Live Arcade.

It's a total clusterfuck...OF FUN!

attributes.title: Worms
attributes.description: Geoff, Gavin, Ray, and Michael go to war in Worms for the Xbox Live Arcade. Naughty names are forbidden.

attributes.title: Max Payne 3
attributes.description: Put on your slow-mo shoes, because you are about to watch Geoff, Michael, Ray and Gavin play some Max Payne 3 multiplayer. May contain confusion and yelling.

attributes.title: Worms Part 2
attributes.description: Michael, Gavin, and Ray return for another explosive round of Worms. Can Ray continue his winning streak or will Michael and Gav double team him Got 'em!

attributes.title: Joel and Jack play Minecraft with Chandler Riggs from Walking Dead!
attributes.description: Joel and Jack meet up with Chandler Riggs who plays Carl on Walking Dead and play some Minecraft together. Join them as they talk about the show and gaming!

attributes.title: London 2012 Part 1
attributes.description: Geoff, Michael, Gavin and Ray enter London each representing their countries. Who will walk out with the gold Watch and find out!

attributes.title: London 2012 Part 2
attributes.description: Geoff, Michael, Gavin and Ray enter London each representing their countries. Who will walk out with the gold Watch and find out!

attributes.title: London 2012 Part 3
attributes.description: Geoff, Michael, Gavin and Ray enter London for the last time. Who will make their country proud and walk out with the Gold Watch and find out!

attributes.title: Left 4 Dead 2: Cold Stream - With Geoff Jack Michael and Gavin - Part 1
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Michael and Gavin take on the endless hordes of zombies in the new L4D2 DLC, Cold Stream. Gavin's footage exploded, so you can't see his screen. Instead, just imagine him shooting his gun a bunch, hitting his team mates and missing most of the zombies.

attributes.title: Left 4 Dead 2: Cold Stream - With Geoff Jack Michael and Gavin - Part 2
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Michael and Gavin finish taking on the endless hordes of zombies in the new L4D2 DLC, Cold Stream. Gavin has footage this time.

attributes.title: Worms 2: Armageddon Episode 1
attributes.description: Michael, Gavin, Geoff and Ray load up Worms 2: Armageddon and get ready for war....again.

attributes.title: Worms 2: Armageddon Episode 2
attributes.description: Michael, Gavin, Geoff and Ray continue the carnage in Worms 2: Armageddon

attributes.title: Borderlands 2 Episode 1
attributes.description: Jack, Geoff, Michael and Gavin dive head first into Borderlands 2. Who will survive the longest Who will be the first to die Who will murder Gavin first Watch and learn!

attributes.title: Trouble in Terrorist Town
attributes.description: Geoff, Michael, Ray, Gavin and Ryan (and some random server denizens) take on Trouble in Terrorist Town for our first PC Let's Play! Mystery! Intrigue! And a lot of accidentally on purpose team kills...

attributes.title: Borderlands 2 (Part 2)
attributes.description: Jack, Geoff, Gavin and Michael are back in Borderlands 2 continuing their quest through Pandora. Come for the Claptrap, stay for the ninja looting by Geoff.

attributes.title: Let's Build - With Gavin and Geoff
attributes.description: Gav and Geoff work together at home to build Connect 4 for Things to do in Minecraft. Watch them get progressively more drunk and stupid as time goes on.

attributes.title: Trouble In Terrorist Town (Part 2)
attributes.description: Geoff, Michael, Ray, Gavin, Kerry, Jack and Ryan are back in Trouble in Terrorist Town! And this time... we know about the special menus! And Gavin's a bog roll (whatever that is).

attributes.title: Borderlands 2 (Part 3)
attributes.description: Jack, Geoff, Michael and Gavin continue their travels in Borderlands 2. Will Gavin figure out how to use his special ability Watch and find out!

attributes.title: Mann Vs Machine
attributes.description: You asked for it so here it is! Achievement Hunter Vs Machine... And I don't want to spoil anything for you, but one of the sides doesn't win.

attributes.title: Bad Piggies - With Geoff and Gav
attributes.description: Geoff and Gav put their heads together to build some amazing contraptions in Bad Piggies!

attributes.title: Mari0 Part 2 - With Geoff, Michael, Gavin and Ryan
attributes.description: Watch part 1 here! - Geoff, Michael, Gavin and Ryan take on the portal levels in Mari0. Will they be more successful than last time No!

attributes.title: Trials Evolution DLC
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Michael, Gavin and Ray revisit Trials Evolution to play the new multiplayer maps! BAIL!

attributes.title: Mari0 Part 3 - With Geoff, Michael, Gavin and Ryan
attributes.description: Geoff, Michael, Gavin and Ryan continue playing the Portal levels in Mari0! Have they established teamwork yet Watch Part 1 - Watch Part 2 -

attributes.title: Geometry Wars 2 - With Geoff, Ray, Michael, and Gavin
attributes.description: Geoff, Ray, Michael, and Gavin head into space to compete in the very popular Xbox Live Arcade game Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved 2.

attributes.title: Payday The Heist
attributes.description: PC Let's Play time again! This time it's Achievement Hunter vs The Bank Heist in PAYDAY The Heist.... and it goes about like you'd expect.

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed III (Volume 1)
attributes.description: Jack, Geoff, Gavin, Michael and Ray go nuts in colonial times, murdering each other in Assassin's Creed III. Watch and laugh at their antics and tell Gavin to get off the damn roof!

attributes.title: Mann Vs Machine Part 2 - Wave666
attributes.description: In honor of the surviving another terrifying night of Halloween we present part 2 of our Mann Vs Machine Let's Play! This time Geoff, Jack, Ray, Michael, Gavin and Ryan take on the hordes of the undead in Wave 666... Will the zombies be easier on them than the machines were

attributes.title: Halo 4 - Infinity Slayer
attributes.description: The Achievement Hunter lads finally get to play Halo 4! Watch Geoff, Jack, Gavin, Michael, Ray and Ryan murder the crap out of each other in two Free-For-All Infinity Slayer matches!

attributes.title: Spartan Ops Episode 1
attributes.description: Jack, Ryan, Ray and Michael take on the first episode of spartan ops!

attributes.title: Halo 4 - Infinity Slayer Episode 2
attributes.description: The gang is back in Halo 4 for more blood, guts, and glory! This time around they play another game of Infinity Slayer and then try their luck in a game of Regicide.

attributes.title: Black Ops 2 Zombies
attributes.description: The AH team takes on grief mode in Zombies to see who is more dangerous... the living or the dead!

attributes.title: Halo 4 - Regicide Episode 3
attributes.description: This week the guys are back in Halo 4 where they face off in three games of Regicide. Will Ray continue to win every game Will Gavin continue to think he's good Will Grif ever stop being so lazy Tune in and find out!

attributes.title: Killing Floor
attributes.description: Get enough undead last week Yeah, we still had some tasty brains left... so this week it's AH vs Killing Floor!

attributes.title: The Hidden
attributes.description: This has been the most requested game in our let's play comments... so here we are completely failing to un-hide the hidden!

attributes.title: Far Cry 3
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Michael, & Ray head to the tropics in the campaign co-op mode in Far Cry 3 for the Xbox 360. It's a jungle in there!

attributes.title: Black Ops 2 Zombies Round 2
attributes.description: We're back in Black Ops 2 for more! This one has it all... action, drama, comedy and zombies!

attributes.title: Far Cry 3 Episode 2
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Michael, & Ray continue to the second level of the co-op campaign in Far Cry 3 for the Xbox 360. Remember to look both ways before you cross the street.

attributes.title: Madden 2013
attributes.description: It is a sad, sad day for Football (or American Awesome Ball for you of the non-United States persuasion), but a great day for you!

attributes.title: Far Cry 3 Episode 3
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Michael, & Ray fight their way through the third level of the Co-op campaign in Far Cry 3 for the Xbox 360. Geoff is very passionate about his work.

attributes.title: Halo 4! (Bonus episode)
attributes.description: In this bonus episode of Let's Play Halo 4, Geoff, Jack, Gavin, Michael, Ray, and Ryan battle it out across multiple gametypes and double up their XP thanks to Mountain Dew.

attributes.title: Halo 4: Crimson Map Pack Episode 1
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Gavin, Michael and Ray take the new Crimson Map Pack DLC for a spin in the latest Let's Play from Achievement Hunter.

attributes.title: Halo 4: Crimson Map Pack Episode 2
attributes.description: Geoff, Jack, Gavin, Michael and Ray continue taking the new Crimson Map Pack DLC for a spin in the latest Let's Play from Achievement Hunter.

attributes.title: Farm Simulator 2013
attributes.description: Yep, you read it right! AH goes agrarian in Farm Simulator 2013. In later news, citizens of Simulated Farm World all starved to death.
